name: Project Whisp (0.2)
description:
Play as a strange dragon with his newly discovered goo power as you learn more about the world he has suddenly woken up in with no prior memory of what has happened. Stealth, Fight, And complete puzzles as you learn more about your newfound abilities and the world you find yourself inhabiting.

This game is still in development, having gotten its first major update that added changes to the combat system such as a stamina bar and abilities to help you in sticky situations. The game is being developed by just myself and a couple volunteer music composing friends.
Development will be slow as I have many other things to worry about and this is just a hobby of mine, but I appreciate any support and love you may have for the game in its current state.

Project Whisp Discord: https://discord.gg/TZ7GyHgJty
Let me know what you think of the game <3
